name: she-can-foundation-dashboard
description: She Can Foundation Intern Dashboard - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: She Can Foundation
